attributes.action: help people who live in poverty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people who live in poverty have done nothing wrong, so why should they live in poverty. The G8 have the power to make poverty history, but they wont if we dont apply pressure on them. on average a child living in poverty dies every 3 seconds, people on the streets get ignored by by-passers and they have no home or family. please sign this petition to try and MAKE POVERTY HISTORY.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
